abstract: Buffalo Sabres center Zemgus Girgensons earns spot at NHL All-Star Game after amassing over 1.5 million votes, mostly from his native Latvia.
lead_paragraph: Zemgus Girgensons, a center for the Buffalo Sabres, earned a spot in the N.H.L. All-Star Game because of the support he received in the league’s fan voting competition, provided largely by Latvia, his home country.
snippet: Zemgus Girgensons, a center for the Buffalo Sabres, earned a spot in the N.H.L. All-Star Game because of the support he received in the league’s fan voting competition, provided largely by Latvia, his home country.

headline.main: In Spectacle of Biggest Stars, a Modest Center Stands Out
headline.seo: Zemgus Girgensons Thrust Into All-Star Game by Latvian Fans
headline.print_headline: In Spectacle of Biggest Stars, a Modest Center Stands Out
